thread.title: Consumer Attorney Eric Seidel to Appear on Ask the Dom Radio Show
thread.title_full: Consumer Attorney Eric Seidel to Appear on Ask the Dom Radio Show - PR.com

author: PR.com
title: Consumer Attorney Eric Seidel to Appear on Ask the Dom Radio Show
text:
Consumer Attorney Eric Seidel to Appear on Ask the Dom Radio Show
Consumer attorney Eric Seidel to appear as a guest on the Ask the Dom radio show on Sunday, September 6th at 10am.
St. Petersburg, FL, September 04, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Consumer attorney Eric Seidel will appear as a guest to discuss his campaign for Clerk of the Circuit Court on the "Ask the Dom" radio show this Sunday, September 6 at 10am on 102.5 The Bone.
Listeners may call into the “Ask the Dom” show live on Sunday, Sept. 6 between 10am-12pm at (727) 579-1025 or (800) 771-1025 with questions for Dominic Fariello. Visit www.theboneonline.com/askthedom/ for more information.
About Dominic “The Dom” Fariello
Dominic Fariello graduated with a J.D. from Nova Southeastern University, the Shepard Broad Law Center in Ft. Lauderdale, FL. He currently runs his own law practice in Tampa, FL, in the areas of personal injury, criminal defense, traffic law and family law.
His radio show, “Ask the Dom,” on 102.5 The Bone, airs live on Sundays from 10am to noon. On the show, he offers free legal advice to callers, and guests add their professional perspective on topics in their field of interest. For more information visit www.askthedom.com.
About Eric Seidel
Eric Seidel is a 1991 Doctor of Law (J.D.) graduate of the Nova Southeastern University – Shepard Broad Law Center. He is a member of the Hillsborough County Bar Association, The Florida Bar, and is admitted to practice before the United States District Court for the Middle District of Florida. Eric created and for 15 years hosted the Ask-A-Lawyer program which continues to this day on Fox13. Seidel is a consumer lawyer and is currently campaigning for Clerk of the Circuit Court. For more information visit www.ericseidelforclerk.com.
